question: Is Prophet (SAW) considered alive or dead? Will we see Allah SWT or not as He is Wujuud?
answer:
QUESTION
ANSWER


Share:
Rasulullah (Sallallaahu Alayhi Wasallam) said, 'Allah Ta'ala has made it
prohibited upon the earth to consume the bodies of prophets.' Rasulullah
(Sallallaahu Alayhi Wasallam) is alive in his blessed grave.

Rasulullah (Sallallaahu Alayhi Wasallam) said, 'Every person that will enter
Jannah will see Allah Ta'ala.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
FATWA DEPT.
